semantic_identifier: [GOLD-145]: Issue History: Hook lifecycle actions to emit status/priority/merge-split/link/note events
title: Issue History: Hook lifecycle actions to emit status/priority/merge-split/link/note events

sections.text: Implement service-layer helpers for the MVP issue_history event types (status timeline, priority changes, merge/split actions, notes, and external work item links) and wire them into the existing Issue mutation flows so events are recorded automatically. Ensure events include actor, timestamp, and sufficient payload to render a timeline later (e.g., from/to values, source/target issue IDs, external system + URL). This ticket intentionally excludes UI rendering and focuses on consistent event emission across backend actions.
